name: Slide Baby, Slide
description:
This is a working version of a game created with p5.js and p5.play.  Help guide a cute little baby seal through the arctic terrain to find its family and friends.  Slide baby slide is in progress and feedback is welcome!  If passively invested or ver bored, please take a moment to give feedback or make suggestions.

Feedback:

https://goo.gl/forms/aC8jA1fHCoxalFat1

Thanks for playing!
